messages.content: The charger that came with my laptop isn’t working.

Hi [Customer], I’m so sorry to hear that your charger isn’t working properly. I’ve arranged for a replacement to be shipped right away — you’ll get a tracking link within 24 hours. Thanks for your patience while we make this right.
I was supposed to get free shipping but I was charged for delivery.

Hi [Customer], thank you for bringing this up. I’ve reviewed your order and confirmed that you qualify for free shipping — I’ve issued a refund for the delivery charge, which will appear in your account within 3–5 business days.
My replacement order hasn’t arrived yet and it’s been over a week.

Hi [Customer], I completely understand your frustration. I’ve checked with our logistics team — your replacement is on the way and expected to arrive in the next two days. I’ll continue monitoring this until it’s delivered.
The item I got is missing a few parts.

Hi [Customer], I’m really sorry your order arrived incomplete. I’ve already requested the missing parts to be shipped out immediately, and you’ll receive an update email shortly. Thank you for your understanding!
I accidentally entered the wrong shipping address for my order.
Hi [Customer], no problem — I’ve updated your shipping address as requested. Your package will now be sent to the correct location, and I’ve confirmed this change with our fulfillment team.
I received a gift order but it doesn’t include a return label.

Hi [Customer], thanks for reaching out. I’ve generated a prepaid return label for your gift item and sent it to your email. You can drop it off at any nearby courier center — we’ll process the return right away.
My refund amount seems incorrect.

Hi [Customer], I understand your concern. I’ve reviewed your transaction and noticed a discrepancy — I’ve corrected it and processed the remaining balance. You’ll see the adjustment in your account within 2–3 business days.
I’m missing the installation manual for my new device.

Hi [Customer], I’m sorry the manual wasn’t included in your package. I’ve emailed you a digital copy right away, and a printed version will be sent with your next shipment. Let me know if there’s anything else I can help with.
I used the wrong email address when placing my order.
Hi [Customer], no worries — I’ve updated your account to the correct email address and re-sent your order confirmation. Please check your inbox for the latest details.
I got a message saying my payment was declined but money was deducted.

Hi [Customer], I completely understand how confusing that can be. I’ve checked your transaction and confirmed that the charge went through — I’ve revalidated your order and you’ll receive your confirmation shortly.
